data.meta_description: The official website of Ocean City, NJ
data.text:
OCEAN CITY PICKLEBALL FACILITIES

18th St. & Haven Ave. (11) Courts

609-525-9307 • pickleball@ocnj.us

May 1st through May 24th — 7:30am to 12:00pm (Noon)

Memorial Day Weekend though Labor Day — 7:00am to 7:30pm

Tuesday after Labor Day through Oct 31st — 7:30am to 12:00pm (Noon)

Season Pass: $60.00

Daily Pass: $5.00

Passes are on sale starting April 15, 2024. Passes can be purchased online at www.ocnj.recdesk.com or in person at the Ocean City Sports & Civic Center (6th & Boardwalk) or at the Ocean City Aquatic & Fitness Center (1735 Simpson Ave.) Passes can be purchased beginning May 1st at the Pickelball office at the 18th & Haven Ave Courts.

Morning Time Sessions

These sessions are open to those who have a 2024 Pickleball Season Membership. Must preregister. Registration opens at 7PM the night before at ocnj.recdesk.com . Space is limited. Those on the waitlist will be notified by phone call if there is an opening. We rotate on a "2 on, 2 off" system. All levels welcome at any session.

Session #1: 7:30 AM - 9:30 AM

Session #2: 9:40 AM - 11:40 AM

Not sure what level you are? Visit this website https://usapickleball.org/tournaments/tournament-player-ratings/player-skill-rating-definitions/

**No Drop ins for open play will be accepted in any of the morning time sessions. Drop ins for open play does not begin until 11:45 AM**

Afternoons

From 11:45 AM - 7:30PM courts are open for play. Cost is a season membership or $5 drop in fee. No reservation needed. If people are waiting to get on a court, play 2 games maximum with your group than rotate off. Courts will be closed at 7:30PM for the night.

CLINICS/LESSONS

Intermediate Level - Thursdays from 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM

Beginner Level - Fridays from 5:00 PM - 6:00 PM

Must register at ocnj.recdesk.com. Space is limited.

Registration for the each clinic opens the 1st day of that month.

PICKLEBALL SOCIALS

Information to come

LADIES NIGHT

Registration for Ladies Round Robin Nights will open on the first of the month at 6:30PM. Must register at ocnj.recdesk.com

Intermediate Level plays on Thursdays from 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM

Advanced Level plays on Fridays from 3:00 PM - 5:00 PM

No charge if player has a 2024 Pickleball Season Membership. $5 drop in fee for non members.

UNIFIED NIGHTS

Information to come

TOURNAMENTS

Information to come

TENNIS PROGRAMS & CLINICS

Make all program and clinic reservations at 6th street tennis desk. Please note, no PM clinics during our camp dates which are scheduled for July 22 - 25 and July 29 - August 1. All programs at 6th street Courts. Clinic dates are subject to change.

Questions and information on all programs contact by email: tennis@ocnj.us or phone 609-525-9306

QUICK START LITTLE TENNIS

Start your little one in tennis this summer.

AGES: 5 to 7

TIME: 4:00 pm to 4:45 pm

DATE: Mondays – starting June 17 - Aug. 19

(No Clinic July 22 & July 29)

COST: $10.00

JUNIOR TENNIS CLINIC

For beginners and intermediates.

AGES: 8 – 13

TIME: 5:00 pm to 6:00 pm

DATE: Mondays – starting June 17 - Aug. 19

(No Clinic July 22 & July 29)

COST: $15.00

CONCENTRATED STROKE CLINIC

Designed for adults of ALL levels.

AGES: Adults

TIME: 6:15 pm to 7:45 pm

DATE: Mondays - starting June 17 - Aug. 19

(No Clinic July 22 & July 29)

COST: $25.00

LADIES DOUBLES ROUND ROBIN

Ladies can enjoy playing doubles. Friendly competition for the Intermediate level. Reserve with payment one week in advance at 6th St.

AGES: 16+

TIME: 8:00 am to 10:00 am

DATE: Wednesdays - starting June 19 - Aug. 7

LOCATION: 6th & Atlantic Ave. Courts

COST: $10.00
